subject: Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: After the surprising victory last year with Animal Kingdom, a winning owner-trainer-jockey trio is aiming for a second straight Kentucky Derby title with another little-raced horse, Went the Day Well.
snippet: After the surprising victory last year with Animal Kingdom, a winning owner-trainer-jockey trio is aiming for a second straight Kentucky Derby title with another little-raced horse, Went the Day Well.
